name: SOGGY and the ZOMBIE CAKES
description:
FREE Android Game

- Discover CANDY worlds

- Fight with ZOMBIE CAKES

- Discover 50 diferent levels

- 2D graphics last generation

You are also tired of so many games candy? you have fun playing with SOGGY, you will be a sponge, so you will clean the world of both candy.

The candyhave become a plague of zombies who want to end it all. There is only one hero who can save us!

The game controls are very simple, if you move the device sideways you can slide down the world. With a tap on the screen you jump, and two taps you can shoot.
